title: Rainbow Bass typeface?
content:
Does anyone know which foundry made this font?  
Is there any book that shows clean specimen of this?

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414042112im_/http:/e-daylight.jp/design/fonts/blog/archives/1010/typony_02.jpg)

Just a side note, I did not own this catalogue, I found it from e-daylight blog...
author: jch02140

comments.content: Thanks for the link Mr. Nick Curtis. :)
